TopicTitle: What do you do while KSP loads?

Articles.Content: I usually either browse these forums or play around with my Rubik's Cubes. What do you guys do?
I'm guessing you either have a crapton of mods, a very slow pc or both, cause I never have time for that during loading time
Well, my mods list is quite large. I have around 1 GB in mods xD.
Not much. Sometimes I get a cup of coffee or hit the head or something. It doesn't take that long to load.
I have on my main rig not enough load time to do anything too complicated, really. I think a more interesting question would be: what do you do while your craft is performing a burn?
I watch it load, even with mods. Or especially with mods. I found that alt+tabbing out to do something else slows down the loading process by an order of magnitude.

I'm guessing you either have a crapton of mods, a very slow pc or both, cause I never have time for that during loading time

You may not be aware how fast some people are with Rubik's cubes.
Sit-ups. If KSP is loading, I'm going to be sitting on my hoop for the next few hours, so might as well get some exercise while I can!

Sit-ups. If KSP is loading, I'm going to be sitting on my hoop for the next few hours, so might as well get some exercise while I can!

Does it work for you? When I play KSP, it's usually for hours at a time, so even if I would do sit-ups, they won't have much of an effect.

Sit-ups. If KSP is loading, I'm going to be sitting on my hoop for the next few hours, so might as well get some exercise while I can!

Right, just make me feel ashamed!

Noted.

Haha, I dread to think how out-of-shape I'd be if I didn't get my 8 sit-ups done when KSP was loading!!

Actually, I have a chair with arms, so I can do leg-raises and the like while doing burns as well. I spend most of my time at work sitting down, so I think if I didn't keep moving I'd probably come down with DVT or something!
When I TAB out of the loading Screen, KSP will tend to give me some black Parts in the VAB. So I prefer to do nothing

You may not be aware how fast some people are with Rubik's cubes.

Obligatory:

Yeah, people are really fast with Rubik's cubes. I'm not that great though, my best is only 14.18 seconds, nearly thrice that in the video.
Not much. Macbook Air, which means I have the graphics turned way down, but the SSD makes it load like greased lightning.

Haha, I dread to think how out-of-shape I'd be if I didn't get my 8 sit-ups done when KSP was loading!!

Actually, I have a chair with arms, so I can do leg-raises and the like while doing burns as well. I spend most of my time at work sitting down, so I think if I didn't keep moving I'd probably come down with DVT or something!

Get out, you role model!

When I TAB out of the loading Screen, KSP will tend to give me some black Parts in the VAB. So I prefer to do nothing

Start it in fake-windowed mode, that should stop it.
I used to exercise during my 6 minute loading times, but now I've gotten lazy and browse these forums, my clan forums, check xkcd/smbc/C&H while it's loading.
Mine loads in about 30 seconds, so I just wait. Also, I loaded up my copy of .16 a few days ago, and it took THREE SECONDS.... Then again, I guess there weren't that many parts.
I have a large list of mods installed as well... So for me it takes about 3 mins! I usually browse these forums or 9GAG (no judging plz) on my iPad. That way it doesn't slow down the loading process.
